#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define mod 1000000007
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
#define loop(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
#define loopi(i,a,b) for(i=b;i>=a;i--)
ll power(ll b, ll e) {
    ll p = 1;
    while (e > 0) {
        if(e&1) {
            p = (p*b)%mod;
        }
        e = e>>1;
        b = (b * b)%mod;
    }
    return p;
}
int main()
{
 ll i,j,k,a,b,c,m,n,t,cs=0,sum;
 s(t);
  while(t--)
  {
  	sum=0;
    s(n);
    cout<<"Case "<<++cs<<": ";
      if(n==1)
        {
            cout<<"1"<<endl;
            continue;
        }
        n--;
        sum=(n+2)%mod * power(2,n-1);
        sum%=mod;
        cout<<sum<<endl;
   
   
  }
return 0;
}
